mapper.select: SELECT project_code as code, project_name as name, project_id as projectId, contract_id as contractId, contract_value as contractValue, contract_value_estimate as contractValueEstimate, operating_income_ratio_id as operatingIncomeRatioId, process_instance_id as processInstanceId, money, dep_money as depMoney, money_ratio*100 as moneyRatio, `value`, dep_value as depValue, value_ratio*100 as valueRatio FROM income_information
